title: ISic000180. Epitaph for C. Haterius Agatocles
body:
Facsimile Images

1CHATERIUS
2CL
3AGATOCLES

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on autopsy

English translation

Gaius Haterius Agatocles, freedman of Gaius

commentary

Although the identity of this Agatocles and his former owner as unknown to us, there is another Haterius known to us in Sicily: a M. Haterius Candidus who was proconsul of Sicily in the Neronian period, as attested in Agrigento, see ISic000473. The name Agatocles is relatively uncommon, appearing in Latin only in a handful of other dedications, often (but not always) in the context of freedpersons (as in the case of our Agatocles here).

bibliography

  • Gualtherus 1624 no. 107 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002388
  • Gualtherus 1624 [1625] no. 264 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001931
  • Castelli 1769 cl.10 no.25 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084
  • Castelli 1784 cl.10 no.28 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083
  • 10.7409 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 102 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Manganaro 1988 50 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
